definition: cannot do without/to be unavoidable/are bound to be many
few/less/to lack/to be missing/to stop (doing sth)/seldom
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly

sentences.english: There is a strange and don't blame don't want again without phenomenon.
sentences.chinese: 这里还有一个怪又不怪不想要又少不了的现象。

sentences.english: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentences.chinese: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is not uncommon to see villagers growing up with fish and prawns served on their dining table daily.
sentences.chinese: 而在这里的成长的居民，从小餐桌上便少不了鱼和虾。

sentences.english: I love thee to the level of everyday's most people need, by sun and candle light.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你如每日之必需，阳光下和烛焰前都少不了。

sentences.english: You will need a camera tripod and of course a digital camera to do this.
sentences.chinese: 你将需要相机三脚架，当然，少不了数码相机。

sentences.english: Most quiet need, by sun and candle-light.
sentences.chinese: 阳光下和烛焰前都少不了。

sentences.english: Finally here you are! We've prepared a feast for you.
sentences.chinese: 终于把您给盼来了，摆酒接风总是少不了的。

sentences.english: And, of course, my daily fresh coconut for 20 Rupees.
sentences.chinese: 当然少不了我的每日20卢比的新鲜椰肉了。

sentences.english: No matter what a costly party diet, on the dining table is little also not kimchi.
sentences.chinese: 不管多么奢华的宴会饮食，餐桌上也少不了泡菜。

sentences.english: Blackberry had its own cake as well, with sugarpaste blackberries of course.(Link)
sentences.chinese: 蓝莓也有自己的蛋糕，上面当然少不了糖做成的蓝莓。

sentences.english: The whole the theory of living , all necessary sleep of adjust.
sentences.chinese: 一切有生之论，都少不了睡眠的调剂。

sentences.english: Television, of course, has played its part in both developments.
sentences.chinese: 当然，这两方面都少不了电视的作用。

sentences.english: I love thee to the level of everyday'sMost quiet need, by sun and candlelight.
sentences.chinese: 我爱你如每日之必需，阳光下和烛焰前都少不了。

sentences.english: This means that there will always be the need for financial book-keeping.
sentences.chinese: 这表示财务方面的簿记工作是一定少不了的。

sentences.english: We can't go without you for this outing.
